column2: With each snorting exhale, flame erupts out of the beast's flared nostrils, and an oily smoke curls from its gaping maws.
The Lammasu breathes out whirling tendrils of magic, as it lives and breathes the very stuff of sorcery.

This creature burns with a terrific intensity, its whole body wreathed in fire and choking smoke. Indeed, so angrily and hot does its skin burn, that swords and axes become molten and blunt on contact.
The Lammasu calls out to a creature of the Dark Lands with an insidious charisma, leaving it befuddled and suggestible to its cunning manipulations.
